com.epam.esm.configuration

Class EsmConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.esm.configuration.EsmConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation.WebMvcConfigurer

    @Configuration
 @EnableWebMvc
 @ComponentScan(value="com.epam.esm")
 @PropertySource(value="classpath:database_configuration.properties")
public class EsmConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation.WebMvcConfigurer
    Main ESM application configuration.

      • dataSource

        @Bean
public javax.sql.DataSource dataSource()
        Created connection pool with HikariCP and set attributes for MySQL database connection.
        Returns:
        - DataSource (Hikari data source)
        See Also:

      • jdbcTemplate

        @Bean
public org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate()
        This is the central class in the JDBC core package. It simplifies the use of JDBC and helps to avoid common errors. It executes core JDBC workflow, leaving application code to provide SQL and extract results. This class executes SQL queries or updates, initiating iteration over ResultSets and catching JDBC exceptions and translating them to the generic, more informative exception hierarchy defined in the org.springframework.dao package.
        Returns:
        - Jdbc template.
        See Also:
        JdbcTemplate
